/api/data_key/¶

You’ll need to this key before you can send data (login/registration).

See also

Limits and conditions, /api/register/, /api/login/.

Warning

Key is valid until specified date (the until field)!

Payload
JSON
{"username": "your_username"}
Response (200)
{"key": "<public_key>", "until": "<UTC date format: YYYY-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ>"}
Example response (200)
{"key": "-----BEGIN PUBLIC KEY-----
